long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email Comments enables your internal team to comment on specific emails within Gmail that only those included in the email can read.

**This Chrome Extension will only add notifications to the Email Comments Gmail add on available in the Google Workspace Marketplace https://workspace.google.com/marketplace/app/email_comments/205158814262 **
